TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NavigationStoppedEventHandler(object sender, NavigationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed NavigationStoppedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NavigationStoppedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As NavigationEventArgs)
public delegate void NavigationStoppedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, NavigationEventArgs ^ e);
type NavigationStoppedEventHandler = delegate of obj * NavigationEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: Representa o método que manipulará eventos .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Esse manipulador de eventos é usado para os seguintes eventos:
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>
